item.title: [CRWD] Jim Cramer on Palo Alto: “I Think It Is a Buy”
item.description: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. I said so many good things about CrowdStrike earlier. Palo Alto’s a terrific company […]

item.title: [TSM] Bank earnings, CPI inflation data, Fed comments: What to Watch
item.description: Market Domination Overtime Host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come next week, including earnings results reported by the Big Banks, December's Consumer Price Index (CPI) inflation data, and a slew of commentary from Federal Reserve officials. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more&nbsp;Market Domination Overtime.

item.title: [AAPL] Senator Dumps Apple, Google, Microsoft To End 2025—But Refuses To Sell This Mag 7 Underperformer
item.description: When it comes to members of Congress’s trading activity, there is a strong focus on what's being bought and when stocks are sold. One senator recently disclosed the sale of three Magnificent Seven stocks sold in December, but a Mag7 stock that wasn't sold could be more telling. Senator Ditches Magnificent Seven Stocks Sen. Shelley Moore Capito (R-W.Va.) recently disclosed selling multiple stocks, including several Magnificent Seven stocks, according to the Benzinga Government Trades page. Here w

item.title: [AAPL] The Score: Constellation, Chevron, Lockheed Martin and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: The Modelo and Corona importer reported lower quarterly sales and profit as customers, particularly Hispanic consumers, continue to buy less beer. Constellation cited weak consumer sentiment and rising unemployment rates, as well as a downturn in “4,000-calorie jobs,” or physically demanding jobs such as construction, that typically boost beer sales. Constellation shares rose 5.3% Thursday.

item.title: [TSM] Dow Jones Futures: Stock Market Runs To Highs; JPMorgan, Goldman, Delta, Taiwan Semi Lead Big Week
item.description: The stock market is at highs with JPMorgan, Goldman, Taiwan Semi and Delta earnings due. Two huge conferences, inflation data and perhaps a Trump tariffs ruling also are on tap.

item.title: [AAPL] Stock Market Today, Jan. 9: S&P 500 Sets New High and Intel Rallies
item.description: Positive jobs data and high-profile political backing for Intel pushed major U.S. indexes toward new highs, today, Jan. 9, 2026.

item.title: [AAPL] These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Oklo, Vistra, Opendoor, Intel, GM, Revolution Medicines, Tilray, and More
item.description: Stocks rose Friday after fresh jobs data showed U.S. unemployment ticked down in December and a potential Supreme Court ruling on tariffs failed to pan out. Vistra stock surged 11% and Oklo jumped 7.9% after the nuclear energy companies unveiled separate agreements to provide power to Meta Platforms in order to support the hyperscaler’s data-center campus in Ohio. Meta inched up 1.1%.
